getKnob(int) - Method in class pLaunchControl.LaunchControl
Returns the Knob object for one of the knobs in the controller, given its ordinal position in the device, following a left to right, top to bottom convention.

getResetMessage() - Static method in class pLaunchControl.Message
Returns a message used to reset the controller at first factory template.
getResetMessage(int) - Static method in class pLaunchControl.Message
All LEDs are turned off, and the buffer settings and duty cycle are reset to their default values.
getSetTemplateMessage() - Static method in class pLaunchControl.Message
Changes the current template in the controller to first factory template (0x08) The following message can be used to change the current template of the device: Hex version F0h 00h 20h 29h 02h 0Ah 77h Template F7h Where Template is 00h-07h (0-7) for the 8 user templates, and 08h-0Fh (8-15) for the 8 factory templates.

getTurnOnFlashing(int) - Static method in class pLaunchControl.Message
Returns a message that turns all active LEDs to flashing.
